allow: Bash(MSYS_NO_PATHCONV=1 az devops service-endpoint azurerm create:*)

Bash(perl -i.bak -p0e 's/          - task: TerraformInstaller\@1
            displayName: ''''Install Terraform \$\(TF_VERSION\)''''
            inputs:
              terraformVersion: ''''\$\(TF_VERSION\)''''/          - bash: |
              wget -q https://releases.hashicorp.com/terraform/\$\(TF_VERSION\)/terraform_\$\(TF_VERSION\)_linux_amd64.zip
              unzip -o terraform_\$\(TF_VERSION\)_linux_amd64.zip
              sudo mv terraform /usr/local/bin/
              terraform version
            displayName: ''''Install Terraform \$\(TF_VERSION\)''''/g' azure-pipelines-terraform.yml)

Bash(# Create a VM-based self-hosted agent
# First, create SSH key if not exists
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -f ~/.ssh/devops_agent_key -N """" -q 2>/dev/null || true

# Create the VM with cloud-init script to install the agent
az vm create \
  --resource-group ""applyplatform-devops-agent-rg"" \
  --name ""devops-agent-vm"" \
  --image ""Canonical:0001-com-ubuntu-server-jammy:22_04-lts-gen2:latest"" \
  --size ""Standard_B2s"" \
  --admin-username ""azureuser"" \
  --generate-ssh-keys \
  --public-ip-sku Standard \
  --custom-data ""$(cat << ''CLOUDINIT''
#cloud-config
package_update: true
packages:
  - curl
  - wget
  - unzip
  - libicu70
  - libssl3
  - git

runcmd:
  - mkdir -p /azp/agent
  - cd /azp/agent
  - curl -fkSL -o vstsagent.tar.gz https://vstsagentpackage.azureedge.net/agent/3.232.3/vsts-agent-linux-x64-3.232.3.tar.gz
  - tar -zxvf vstsagent.tar.gz
  - chown -R azureuser:azureuser /azp
  - sudo -u azureuser ./config.sh --unattended --url https://dev.azure.com/citadelcloudmanagement --auth pat --token 3cFdmiCJityL6Dq5PEETFaet6KuUdDlvgQOZSGDEMatTgXwOB94eJQQJ99BLACAAAAAAAAAAAAASAZDO13vZ --pool Default --agent devops-agent-vm --acceptTeeEula
  - ./svc.sh install azureuser
  - ./svc.sh start
  - wget -q https://releases.hashicorp.com/terraform/1.6.0/terraform_1.6.0_linux_amd64.zip
  - unzip -o terraform_1.6.0_linux_amd64.zip
  - mv terraform /usr/local/bin/
  - curl -sL https://aka.ms/InstallAzureCLIDeb | bash
CLOUDINIT
)"" \
  -o json 2>&1)
